scenes.description: A handwritten message from Pavolia Reine appears on screen while her 3D model waves and poses.
3D Showcase end screen featuring Pavolia Reine's logo, hashtag, and character art over a stylized city background.

subtitles.original: After waiting for so long, the time to celebrate and cheer has finally come!
subtitles.english: After waiting for so long, the time to celebrate and cheer has finally come!

subtitles.original: There are still so many things to see and experience in the story of Pavolia Reine,
subtitles.english: There are still so many things to see and experience in the story of Pavolia Reine,

subtitles.original: and I am forever grateful to have you all be part of it.
subtitles.english: and I am forever grateful to have you all be part of it.

subtitles.original: I will always treasure the memories we have, and I'm excited to make new ones! - Reine
subtitles.english: I will always treasure the memories we have, and I'm excited to make new ones! - Reine
